_gram:
[{#apAM idaM tatrasADu saMskftaM vA#} 
{#yat; adBiH saMskftaM#} <ls>P. IV. 4. 134</ls>]
_meanings:
{@--1@} 
Connected with or coming from water
<ls>Rv. 2. 38. 7</ls>; watery; consisting of,
consecrated with, water (as {#haviH#}).

{@--3@} Active, connected
with sacrificial acts <ls n="Rv.">1. 145. 5.</ls>
